Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= small size container; ► used for storing oil

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= causative action by which humans cause a liquid to flow from one place to another

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= causative action by which someone in authority confers the office of priest, king, or prophet on another person, by pouring oil on that person's head
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose

= woman; ◄ daughter of Laban (לָבָן) ► second and favorite wife of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) mother of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) and Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) and, through her slave girl Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) of Dan (דָּן) and Naphtali (נַפְתָּלִי)
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= location; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= large, strong, female donkey (חֲמֹור) ► used for riding
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= large, strong, female donkey (חֲמֹור) ► used for riding

Node.gloss: to fear|to worry|to be anxious|to be afraid|to be distressed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear, anxiety, or distress ◄ out of uncertainty of what might happen to themselves or their beloved ones; ► which may express itself in trembling and shaking of the body

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which deities or humans move from one location to another
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= oak tree; ◄ located near Bethel (בֵּית־אֵל)
= tree; ► location where Saul (שָׁאוּל) met three men, shortly after having been anointed king
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= town and cult centre, also referred to as Beth Aven (בֵּית אָוֶן) or simply Aven (אָוֶן) ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) near the border of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= the male young of a goat (עֵז)
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= a quantity of bread that is baked as one piece
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= container ◄ made of a goatskin, the outer side of which has been turned inside; ► used for storing wine

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
literally: (someone's) hand; hence: = state in which humans own a particular object
= referent to the time after the event in focus

Node.gloss: Gibeath Elohim|Gibeah of God|Hill of God
Node.definition: exact meaning unsure; = location, probably to be identified with the town of Gibeah (גִּבְעָה) or Geba (גֶּבַע) ◄ territory of Bethlehem; ► the place where Saul (שָׁאוּל) met a group of prophets and prophesied with them
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= group of soldiers stationed in a certain area to defend it
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

Node.gloss: to meet|to run into|to find|to come across|to come upon
Node.definition: = process by which humans or animals unexpectedly meet other humans or animals while travelling from one location to another
= to be assembled in a group
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= place of worship, often situated in an elevated location, but not necessarily so
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox

= musical instrument, consisting of a membrane, usually of animal skin, which was stretched over a shallow circular, triangular, or square frame; ► it was struck sharply with one or two hands, depending on where it was situated; it could be held in one hand, under the arm, or against the chest and struck with the other hand, or it could be held on the knees or the ground and struck with one or two hands; the fingers of one hand could be used to tighten or loosen the tension on the membrane as it was struck
= a high pitched wind instrument consisting of a tube with holes along it, ◄ usually made of wood

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing

Node.gloss: to rush (upon), to come (over)|to possess, grip, take control
Node.definition: = action by which an outside force (perhaps divine) quickly comes over a person, gaining control over the person or causing some immediate outcome

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which humans, deities, or objects take on a different nature, character, or form
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: (one's) hands find (something to do); hence: = state in which humans have the opportunity and ability to do something
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

= location; ◄ close to Jericho (יְרִחֹו) ► first camp of Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) after crossing the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) here they set up twelve stones as a monument; it later became the location of a cultic center
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: to turn (one's) shoulder; hence: = action by which humans turn around in order to move away from the place they were facing earlier
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)
= causative process by which humans, deities, or forces give (other) humans or objects a different nature, character, or form
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= town, possibly to be identified with Geba (גֶּבַע) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► place where someone's concubine (פִּילֶגֶשׁ) was raped by a large group of men; home town of King Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= to be assembled in a group
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them

Node.gloss: to rush (upon), to come (over)|to possess, grip, take control
Node.definition: = action by which an outside force (perhaps divine) quickly comes over a person, gaining control over the person or causing some immediate outcome

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: (what used to be done) before, in the past
Node.definition: = reference to times in the past when a certain activity used to take place repeatedly

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Abiel (אֲבִיאֵל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► father of king Saul (שָׁאוּל)

= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to place (in a position) > to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= group of interrelated families
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus
= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: to capture; hence: = process by which an individual or group is chosen by lot, which is understood as a direct divine intervention
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
literally: to capture; hence: = process by which an individual or group is chosen by lot, which is understood as a direct divine intervention
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
= clan of king Saul (שָׁאוּל) ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
literally: to capture; hence: = process by which an individual or group is chosen by lot, which is understood as a direct divine intervention
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption|= man; ◄ son of Abiel (אֲבִיאֵל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► father of king Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans go to a location where they will not be readily seen by others; ► in order to be safe from danger or to attack someone else
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose
= state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status
= the upper part of the human body between the head and the chest; ≈ associated with heavy burdens, and, in a more figurative way, heave responsibilities

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a standard or agreed upon behavior or practice, as characteristic of a particular individual, group or community
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to let go|to dismiss|to send (someone) on his way|to free|to release
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities allow (other) humans to leave a certain place and go home
= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= town, possibly to be identified with Geba (גֶּבַע) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► place where someone's concubine (פִּילֶגֶשׁ) was raped by a large group of men; home town of King Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to touch the heart; hence: = causative action where deities are changing the thinking patterns of humans, either directly or through certain events
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: to despise|to disdain|to scorn|to consider (something) beneath (oneself)
Node.definition: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
= action by which someone purposely refrains from responding, either with words or with actions
